page.title: 03 Games
page.content: There are many different{games} which we play for{recreation}.Some are played outdoors and some are for indoors. We have picked three different types of games which we are going to describe . SCRABBLE. Scrabble is a board game where you have seven letters and you have to make a word from a word like a crossword puzzle. {FOOTBALL.} It is a very popular game played by 11 people and two teams. There are two posts at each end of the field. The idea of the game is you try to kick a round ball in between the two posts {COMPUTER GAMES.}One of the best computer games is Pitfall. The player has to get past many obstacles to get a key and unlock the house.
